--- In gladiator@y..., "m_yohalem2002" <zqca@d...> wrote:
> 
> > Eat corpse supposedly works.  Resurrect works.
> 
> You cast it on the shield?
No, you have to use resurrect before any of your team mates run over 
the shield.

> 
> > With a one player team, cycling through undoes the effect 
> 
> Hmm...
> 
> > Hehe.  "Tic and Tac" is the hardest level by far in my book.  It's 
> > because the experience levels of those opponents are so high.
> 
> This level is pretty easy so long as you make the elves fight 
> Jakarta's men.  If you try to brute force it, it's a real meat 
> grinder.  I suppose with a large army you can't control your men 
well 
> enough to hold back, though.

A small army can barely surive.  I beat that scenario with a large 
army when the minor miracle of my entire team acting like a team 
occurred; most of the time, they acted like it's every character for 
himself/herself.
 
> > At least now you can download a version of Gladiator:Beyond 
> Freedom.  
> > visit http://groups.yahoo.com/group/gladiator/files/Alpa/ to 
> download 
> > the files for that program.
> 
> This is the same alpha that's been around on the FSGames site for a 
> while, right?  I remember finding it unplayable -- doesn't it run 
> super fast or something?

The G:BF version on FSGames has not been downloadable since I've been 
around.  The guy who uploaded it claims it works.
   
> > No.  We had a pretty good discussion a while back about adding new 
> > abilites to characters and expanding character classes.
> 
> That's too bad.

I am going to get around to recycling that discussion sometime next 
year.  I am going to work out a schedule for discussion to keep this 
group fairly active.
   
> > I would recommend to try the tevfifty first.  After that, 
> > try mine (dph's scenarios).
> 
> Do these start on Level 1, or are they "play after you beat the 
> game" -- by level 1 I mean troops @ level 1, not scenario 1.

1)The tevify supposedly is.  

2)My scenarios (dph's scenarios) aren't.  If you are going through my 
scenarios, you need to make sure your team has been through all 
built-in scenarios and the tevifty.  Otherwise, you're going to run 
into trouble by opponents have high experience levels.  Others have 
claimed they can't beat one of my scenarios without a character 
becoming an experience level higher after beating a scenario.  It's 
pretty scary how high the experience levels of my team are after being 
 through the built-in scenarios, the tevfifty, and my own.  I still 
gotta complete the set of 50 and I am concerned about crashing the 
game by ending up with a character who has too high an experience 
level.

The 50 Project is about creating 50 brand new scenarios as a group to 
start with a brand-new team.  Basic plotline has been developed by me. 
 I just gotta work on breaking the individual stories for every 
scenario.  If the 50 project proves fairly successfull, I have a 
follow-up ready.
  
> > We're also working on getting a gladiator tournament ready.
> 
> ?  How would that work?

Offline by sending your saved game files in.  We have established 
basic rules (somebody remind me to put them in a file in the file 
section).
 
> How many people still subscribe to this list, btw?

64.
